mapper.sql: id, order_id, material_id, sub_user_id, material_quantity, material_price, order_status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select id, order_id, material_id, sub_user_id, material_quantity, material_price from sup_material_order_detail where sub_user_id = #{subUserId}

select sup_material_order_detail.id ,order_id,material_id,materials_detail.metarials_name as materialsName,material_quantity,sub_user_id FROM sup_material_order_detail LEFT JOIN materials_detail on material_id = materials_detail.id WHERE sub_user_id = #{supUserId} and order_status= #{orderStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into sup_material_order_detail (order_id, material_id, sub_user_id, material_quantity, material_price, order_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materialQuantity,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{materialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

order_id,
material_id,

mapper.update:
update sup_material_order_detail
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_user_id = #{subUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material_quantity = #{materialQuantity,jdbcType=FLOAT},
material_price = #{materialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sup_material_order_detail set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_user_id = #{subUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, material_quantity = #{materialQuantity,jdbcType=FLOAT}, material_price = #{materialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
